Ever since I first tried to learn C++ after school in the 11th grade, I've come a long way in the coding world! These days, I enjoy contributing to and trying out new R packages.

### I'm a Contributor

POSSUM has functions implementing the maximum likelihood estimator for Poisson regression (with a misclassified covariate) that I derived during my master's thesis, while ThemePark has functions implementing a ggplot theme I designed in honor of Taylor Swift's newest album, *The Tortured Poets Department*. Click the hex stickers to check them out!
